ormauthator was a skeleton red dragon in 1375 DR.
Gormauthator was one of the dragons that assaulted Shadowdale in 1356 DR during a flight of dragons Sylun√© Silverhand fought the three more powerful dragons, among those Gormauthator, at the Tower of Ashaba and destroyed the dragons at the price of her own life. In 1375 DR in a effort to terrify the population, the cleric of Shar Esvele Greycastle raised Gormauthator as a skeleton to guard Sylunes tomb.
